column1: Hiril (born circa ) was the younger daughter of Halmir
column2: third Halad or warden of the Haladin.  She was the sister of Haldir (Chieftain of the Haladin)
column4: and Hundar.  She was married to Enthor and she bore him a daughter Meleth.
